items.title: Offensive battle leads to a Seahawks win, a berth to Super Bowl LX
items.description: Seattle defeats Los Angeles in the NFC Championship Game and advances to Super Bowl LX to face the Patriots.

items.title: The Patriots just showed us what it means to hire the right coach
items.description: New England just went from 4-13 in 2024 to the Super Bowl with Mike Vrabel.
